Package gate.plugin.learningframework.features

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FeatureExtractionBase
    Base class for the FeatureExtraction classes.
    FeatureExtractionDense
    Code for extracting features from a document based on a FeatureInfo into a dense representation.
    FeatureExtractionMalletSparse
    Code for extracting features from a document based on a FeatureInfo.
    FeatureInfo
    This contains the information from the parsed FeatureSpecification plus additional information accumulated during the extraction of a corpus.
    FeatureSpecAttribute  
    FeatureSpecAttributeList  
    FeatureSpecification
    Parse a feature specification and create an initial FeatureInfo object.
    FeatureSpecNgram  
    FeatureSpecSimpleAttribute  
    SeqEncoder
    Class for implementing methods to convert sequences to classes and back
    SeqEncoder_SimpleBIO
    Class for implementing methods to convert sequences to classes and back
